attributes.action: Repeal all legislation that impinges on the right to self defense.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: legislation in many areas, passed since 1900, has altered the right of self defense to such an extent that vctims of crime who defend themselves, property or others are considered to be criminals and treated as such.  All persons should have the legal right to take whatever passive preventative and reactive measures they consider necessary for their own and others self defense.
